content: अवचन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] Not speaking, silent, speechless; शकुंतला साध्वसादवचना तिष्ठति <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> --नं [अभावे न. त.] {@--1@} Absence of assertion, silence, taciturnity; अवचनेऽग्निष्टोमः <ls>Kāty.</ls> {@--2@} Censure, blame, reproof; °कर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} not doing what one is bid, disobedient.
